elements.name: When a GET request that does not contain valid authorization information and data (id) is sent to the
elements.description:
api/getNoticeById endpoint, the status code returned is 203 and the message information in the response body is
  "No id or wrong id." It should be verified that it is

steps.name: The api user sets "api/getNoticeById" path parameters
The api user prepares a GET request that does not contain data
The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response.
The api user verifies that the status code is 203.

name: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to access the list of blood types registered in the system via API connection.
